title: Facing corruption allegations, Albanian opposition leader hires Trump-linked lobbying team
summary: Indicted Albania opposition leader Sali Berisha hired a Trump-aligned lobbying firm to get the Trump administration to remove his sanction designation under a US anti-kleptocracy law. Berisha also employs Chris LaCivita–Trump’s 2024 campaign co-manager–as an advisor in his country’s upcoming parliamentary elections
